name: edia.core
description:
eDia framework to base experiments on.
Additional features are separated packages. 

Included in this package are: 
-DemoTasks: Two different tasks you can use as guide.
-DemoConfig files: Config files needed for DemoTasks, or as base for own config files. 
 NOTE: Move the whole folder /Samples/Configs to  /Assets/Configs !!
-URP materials: Simple example materials to get you started with URP

samples.description: Scene with a sample task that runs through the complete experiment.

Config files needed for DemoTasks, or as base for own config files. 
 NOTE: Move the whole folder /Samples/Configs to  /Assets/Configs !!
Simple example materials to get you started with URP
Template scripts for own development of tasks
